articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Afghanistan's Fazalhaq Farooqi sacked by BBL side after 'incident' - DAWN.com
articles.description: The fast bowler’s contract was torn up after the club  “received a complaint about the behaviour of Farooqi".
articles.content:
SYDNEY: Afghan international Fazalhaq Farooqi was fired Friday by his Big Bash League side Sydney Thunder following an incident last week that was investigated by Cricket Australia.
